subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Goalkeepers Bouna Coundoul of the Red Bulls and Troy Perkins of D.C. United each made one good save in a 0-0 tie in Harrison, N.J.
snippet: Goalkeepers Bouna Coundoul of the Red Bulls and Troy Perkins of D.C. United each made one good save in a 0-0 tie in Harrison, N.J.
